project_descr: Assistance to enable Trinidad and Tobago fulfill its obligation under the Stockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants-  PIMS 3058 POPs EA Trinidad and Tobago

outputs.output_descr: The Assistance to Enable Trinidad and Tobago Fulfill its Obligation Under the Stockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) project will assist in the formulation of the National Implementation Plan (NIP), a requirement of the Convention.

document_name: Initial Assistance to Enable Trinidad and Tobago to Fulfill its Obligations Under the Stockholm Convention on POPS prodoc
https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/TTO/Initial Assistance to Enable Trinidad and Tobago to Fulfill its Obligations Under the Stockholm Convention on POPS prodoc.pdf
